name: trayway
description: Удобный доступ к папкам и сайтам из трея macOS

scripts.build:optimized: npm run build && node scripts/optimize-app.js "release-build/TrayWay-darwin-arm64/TrayWay.app" && node scripts/compress-resources.js "release-build/TrayWay-darwin-arm64/TrayWay.app"
scripts.build:optimized:x64: npm run build:x64 && node scripts/optimize-app.js "release-build/TrayWay-darwin-x64/TrayWay.app" && node scripts/compress-resources.js "release-build/TrayWay-darwin-x64/TrayWay.app"
scripts.build:optimized:universal: npm run build:universal && node scripts/optimize-app.js "release-build/TrayWay-darwin-arm64/TrayWay.app" && node scripts/compress-resources.js "release-build/TrayWay-darwin-arm64/TrayWay.app" && node scripts/optimize-app.js "release-build/TrayWay-darwin-x64/TrayWay.app" && node scripts/compress-resources.js "release-build/TrayWay-darwin-x64/TrayWay.app"
scripts.dmg:all: npm run dmg:arm64 && npm run dmg:x64 && npm run dmg:universal
scripts.release:arm64: npm run build:optimized && npm run dmg:arm64
scripts.release:x64: npm run build:optimized:x64 && npm run dmg:x64
scripts.release:universal: npm run build:optimized:universal && npm run dmg:universal
scripts.release:all: npm run build:optimized:universal && npm run dmg:all
